snippet.title: Black Hole Survivor Official Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Black Hole Survivor is the first game of Trike Studios. Beat your high score in this fast paced physics based twin stick action game. 

Black Hole Survivor will be released for PC sometime in 2021. It can be played with a mouse and keyboard or a controller. 

Please follow us on twitter and itch for all the latest information. 
https://studiotrike.itch.io/black-hole-survivor
